comment: Next is Frieda Allweiss, who was born in Poland and saw Hitlers armies overrun her area of Poland and invade the Soviet Union. She and her mother were evacuated to Uzbekistan and later to Siberia.
amr:

            :domain (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Frieda"
                        :op2 "Allweiss")
                  :ARG1-of (b / bear-02

                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Poland")))
                  :ARG0-of (s / see-01
                        :ARG1 (a / and
                              :op1 (o / overrun-01
                                    :ARG0 (a2 / army
                                          :poss (p2 / person
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "Hitler")))
                                    :ARG1 (a3 / area
                                          :poss p
                                          :location c))
                              :op2 (ii / invade-01
                                    :ARG0 a2
                                    :ARG1 (c2 / country
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Soviet"
                                                :op2 "Union")))))))
      :snt2 (e / evacuate-01
            :ARG1 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (s2 / she)
                  :op2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 s2
                              :ARG2 (m2 / mother))))
            :ARG2 (a5 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / country
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Uzbekistan"))
                  :op2 (c4 / country
                        :name (n7 / name
                              :op1 "Siberia")))
            :time (a6 / after
                  :op1 a)))

comment: First up is Rise Stillman, who was sent to the Auschwitz, Birkenau and Bergen-Belsen concentration camps during the Holocaust. Her parents and a younger brother and sister died in Auschwitz.

                  :op1 "Rise"
                  :op2 "Stillman")
            :ARG1-of (s / send-01
                  :ARG2 (a / and

                        :op2 (c2 / concentration-camp
                              :name (n3 / name

                        :op3 (c3 / concentration-camp
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Bergen-Belsen")))
                  :time (e / event

            :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                  :value 1))
      :snt2 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p2 / person

                  :op2 (a3 / and

                                    :ARG1 s2

                        :op2 (p5 / person

                        :ARG1-of (h4 / have-degree-91

comment: Sheryl Brokesh, president of the Phoenix Holocaust Association, reached out to state Rep. who helped facilitate vaccinations for the survivors.They are among the last remaining eyewitnesses to the horrors of the Holocaust.
